ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"فَوَقَاهُمُ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":74778,"word_number_in_surah":81,"word_translation":"But will protect them","word_transliteration":"fawaqahumu"},{"word_arabic":"اللَّهُ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":74779,"word_number_in_surah":82,"word_translation":"Allah","word_transliteration":"al-lahu"},{"word_arabic":"شَرَّ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":74780,"word_number_in_surah":83,"word_translation":"(from the) evil","word_transliteration":"sharra"},{"word_arabic":"ذَلِكَ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":74781,"word_number_in_surah":84,"word_translation":"(of) that","word_transliteration":"dhalika"},{"word_arabic":"الْيَوْمِ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":74782,"word_number_in_surah":85,"word_translation":"Day","word_transliteration":"al-yawmi"},{"word_arabic":"وَلَقَّاهُمْ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":74783,"word_number_in_surah":86,"word_translation":"and will cause them to meet","word_transliteration":"walaqqahum"},{"word_arabic":"نَضْرَةً","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":74784,"word_number_in_surah":87,"word_translation":"radiance","word_transliteration":"nadratan"},{"word_arabic":"وَسُرُورًا","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":74785,"word_number_in_surah":88,"word_translation":"and happiness","word_transliteration":"wasururan"}]
